text: The 2009 Italian Athletics Championships () was the 99th edition of the Italian Athletics Championships and were held in Grosseto from 31 July - 2 August. ==Champions== {| class="wikitable" width=60% style="font-size:90%; text-align:center;" |- !Event !!Men !!Women |- |100 m||align=left|Simone Collio||align=left|Anita Pistone |- |200 m||align=left|Roberto Donati||align=left|Giulia Arcioni |- |400 m||align=left|Matteo Galvan||align=left|Libania Grenot |- |800 m||align=left|Mario Scapini||align=left|Elisa Cusma |- |1500 m||align=left|Mario Scapini||align=left|Elena Romagnolo |- |5000 m||align=left|Stefano La Rosa||align=left|Federica Dal Rì |- |10,000 m||align=left|Stefano La Rosa||align=left|Anna Incerti |- |3000 m steeplechase||align=left|Matteo Villani||align=left|Emma Quaglia |- |100 m hurdles||align=left|Stefano Tedesco||align=left|Micol Cattaneo |- |400 m hurdles||align=left|Nicola Cascella||align=left|Benedetta Ceccarelli |- |Hogh jump||align=left|Nicola Ciotti||align=left|Raffaella Lamera |- |Pole vault||align=left|Giorgio Piantella||align=left|Anna Giordano Bruno |- |Long jump||align=left|Alessio Guarini||align=left|Tania Vicenzino |- |Triple jump||align=left|Fabrizio Schembri||align=left|Magdelin Martinez |- |Shot put||align=left|Marco Di Maggio||align=left|Chiara Rosa |- |Discus throw||align=left|Hannes Kirchler||align=left|Laura Bordignon |- |Hammer throw||align=left|Nicola Vizzoni||align=left|Clarissa Claretti |- |Javelin throw||align=left|Roberto Bertolini||align=left|Zahra Bani |- |10/5 km race walk||align=left|Ivano Brugnetti||align=left|Sibilla Di Vincenzo |- |4x100 m relay||align=left|Atletica Riccardi (Dentali-Marani-Pistono-Tomasicchio)||align=left|G.S. Forestale (Arcioni F.-Grillo-Arcioni G.-Giovanetti |- |4x400 m relay||align=left|Assindustria Padova (Ramalli-Picello-Zani-Cappelin)||align=left|C.S.
